name: Budapest Parliament Tour & Grand City Tour - for non EU citizens
description: Did you know that the Hungarian Parliament is the 3rd biggest parliament in the whole World, and the biggest, most expensive building in Hungary? No?! Well, now it’s your chance to get to see it. This is not only an architectural visit, You’ll be able to see the 1000 years old Hungarian Holy Crown (worn by the very first king of Hungary: St Stephen). Don’t miss out!
